title: Process Discovery Workshop Whiteboard Capture
description: Photograph of whiteboard from Day 2 process discovery workshop with mortgage operations team. Shows hand-drawn as-is process flow with participant annotations highlighting pain points and workarounds.
location: Meridian National Bank - Main Branch, Conference Room 4B
annotations: Yellow sticky notes show unofficial workarounds not in SOPs
Arrow labeled 'shadow process' between Document Collection and UW Review
Participant noted: 'We always check the spreadsheet first' (refers to EV-026)
